task.title: Pulling updates from the remote repository
task.shortdesc: The add-on supports pulling from remote branches using either the pull and merge or the pull and rebase strategy. The default pull strategy is pull and merge.

prereq.p: Make sure that the current working copy is set to an initialized repository.

step.cmd: To pull from the upstream branch using the default strategy, click the Pull from remote/branch icon.
To change the pull strategy, expand the Pull menu and select either Pull (merge) or Pull (rebase).

result.p: If the pull was successful, your current local branch is now up-to-date with the upstream branch.
